Name: Maverik #600
Notes: Optional morning fill so you leave Gambit Trail near‑full.

Name: Speedy’s Super Fuels
Notes: Short refill or push to Winslow if fresh.

Name: Flying J #913
Notes: Fuel before short final hop to Cedar Rapids.

Name: Grade & Temps
Notes: If temp<32°F or freezing rain forecast, delay departure; fuel at Cordes Lakes if <1/2 tank.

Name: Wind & Black‑Ice
Notes: If wind>20 mph (N/W) or wet‑bulb freezing, avoid night driving; consider Holbrook or Tucumcari stop.

Name: Cross‑winds & Drifts
Notes: If cross‑winds>25 mph or blowing snow, fuel early at Liberal; reduce cruise; watch slush ridges.
